text: The Art of Love is a 1965 American comedy movie. It was directed by Norman Jewison. It was written by Carl Reiner (who also stars). Other actors include James Garner, Dick Van Dyke, Angie Dickinson, and Elke Sommer. It was distributed by Universal Pictures. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1965 comedy movies Category:American comedy movies Category:Movies directed by Norman Jewison Category:Universal Pictures movies Category:Movies set in Paris
title: The Art of Love
